channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: California’s insurance crisis leaves neighbors facing unequal recovery after wildfires
item.description: Next-door neighbors lost their near-identical homes in a California wildfire, but how they are navigating rebuilding is a story of contrasting fortunes and unequal recovery, a stark reflection of the nation’s growing home insurance crisis.

item.title: Federal judge to hear arguments in suit aiming to stop Trump’s birthright citizenship order
Trump to sign executive order barring transgender female athletes from competing
